title: lol reconnect broken
body: when I started a game or aram it wouldn't work after 10 min this was at the champ select screen so I logged out and logged in and I clicked reconnect and nothing happend at all so I tried again the same thing never happend to me before please help

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=RYANO2012,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=zUvRXiG3,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-21T23:37:09.528+0000)
>
> when I started a game or aram it wouldn't work after 10 min this was at the champ select screen so I logged out and logged in and I clicked reconnect and nothing happend at all so I tried again the same thing never happend to me before please help

Just be careful, u might get hit by leaver buster and it is very unpleasant. Wait for a few days until RIOT fixes this server problem.
The servers have been having a few hiccups. Wait a while and then try again. If it's still happening, come back to here.
